ICS
WolfGang Pensacola invites the community to an exciting evening celebrating the 4th Annual Pensacola Paw-di Gras with an exclusive Meet-and-Greet featuring the Pensacola Ice Flyers, one of this yearâ€™s presenting sponsors. Join us on Tuesday, January 28, 2025, from 6:00 PM to 8:00 PM at Perfect Plain Brewing Co., another proud presenting sponsor of Paw-di Gras.
This free, family-friendly event is the perfect way to kick off the festivities for Paw-di Gras, happening on February 16, 2025. Event highlights include:
-Meet the Pensacola Ice Flyers: Get to know some of your favorite local hockey players, take photos with Maverick, the teamâ€™s beloved mascot, and enjoy the camaraderie of Pensacolaâ€™s hockey community.
-Trivia Extravaganza: Test your knowledge of hockey, Mardi Gras, animals, construction, and beer for a chance to win fun prizes. Trivia will start at 7pm.
-Beer Debuts and Specials: Perfect Plain Brewing Co. will launch their new Paw-di Gras Pilsner, a festive beer brewed specially for the upcoming Paw-di Gras celebration. Enjoy $2 off Paw-di Gras Pilsner during the event. Plus, try the Maverick-Themed Beer, created just for this night.
-Meet the Krewe of Hip Huggers: As the official Krewe supporters of Paw-di Gras, come meet these amazing ladies and learn about their community contributions.
-Meet the Owners of Hanto & Clarke: Learn about the incredible ways this presenting sponsor makes a difference in Pensacola.
-Grab your exclusive Paw-di Gras merch: The official hats, cups, earrings, koozies, and more will be available for you to purchase before the big event on February 16th. If you purchase the official stainless steel cup and present it to the bartender at Perfect Plain during the meet & greet, you will receive $1 off every beer you purchase. Better yet?! Youâ€™ll also receive a $1 off every beer when using the cup at Paw-di Gras!
-Sign up for the paw-rade & costume contests: Youâ€™ll have an opportunity to be helped while signing up for the paw-rade and contests at Paw-di Gras
-In addition to the festivities, the event is a great opportunity to:
Connect with WolfGang Pensacola to learn more about Pensacola Paw-di Gras and its mission.
-Meet representatives from the Escambia County Animal Shelter, this yearâ€™s Paw-di Gras benefactor, and even meet a few adoptable dogs.
This event is free and open to the public, and we encourage everyone to join us in celebrating local businesses, animal advocacy, and Pensacola pride.
Kick off the excitement with us on January 28th, enjoy exclusive beer debuts, meet our incredible sponsors, and gear up for an unforgettable Pensacola Paw-di Gras on February 16th!

Step back in time to the glitzy and dangerous 1920s at our Roaring Murder Mystery Show at Garden & Grain!
A 1920s interactive murder mystery show where YOU solve the crime !
Throw on your 20s attire & join us for a evening of fun and mystery!
Plot: Set in a 1920â€™s Speakeasy, an artifact has been brought in to be appraised from the excavation of King Tut's tomb, but does his curse follow? Between Murder, the Mafia, Moonshining, Mystics, and the supernatural, this mystery will take everything Detective Gunn and YOU have to solve the case! (Written & Directed by: Clayton Habecker)
Seating is limited.
Order your tickets now on Eventbrite!
All tickets include SHOW ONLY
Bar service also available from Garden & Grain.
(*If avaible)Food truck will be on site for food or orders
Show opens at 6:00pm for seating and mingling with guests and characters, with show scheduled to start at approximately 7:00pm.
No dress code required, but we do encourage you to dress up in your favorite 1920s theme attire!

Our Story
Hi, we're Perfect Plain Brewing Co., Garden & Grain, Perennial, and The Well.
Located in the heart of Downtown Pensacola, our mission is to create incredible experiences that make our beer, our brewery, and our hometown, Pensacola, unforgettable.
â€œPensacola is a perfect plain. The land nearly as white as flour but productive of fine peaches, oranges in abundance, grapes, figs, pomegranates, etc. Fine flowers grow spontaneously, for they have neglected the gardens, expecting a change of government. The town is immediately on the bay-the most beautiful water prospect I ever saw; and from 10 oâ€™clock in the morning until 10 at night we have the finest sea breeze. There is something in it so exhilarating, so pure, so wholesome, it enlivens the whole system.â€ - Rachel Jackson, July 23, 1821
About Our Taproom
Located in the heart of downtown Pensacola, our facility is the original location of Perfect Plain Brewing Companyâ€™s brewery and taproom.
Designed to bring people together in a spacious, welcome environment, the taproom is a fully immersive experience with long communal tables and our entire 10-barrel brewhouse exposed within the gathering area. Portions of our building date back more than 75 years, and architectural signs of decadesâ€™ past have been preserved in our space.
We completed our taproom with an expansive, dog friendly patio facing historic Garden Street.
In 1764, when Garden Street was the northern border of Pensacolaâ€™s small downtown core, any resident who purchased land was given a companion parcel to use for a garden. To this day, the boundary lines of Perfect Plainâ€™s space fits the original â€œGarden lotâ€ dimensions.
About Garden & Grain
Located directly behind Perfect Plain Brewing Co., Garden & Grain is our cocktail garden and private event space. Our grounds were once mapped by British officer Elias Durnford in 1742 to serve as a place for a Pensacola family to plant its garden.
Garden & Grain includes a lush and expansive city garden, which is home to an outdoor bar featuring a meticulously curated and completely handcrafted cocktail menu.
In addition, the Grainhouse, a former horse stable and feed and seed warehouse, has been transformed into a sleek and vibrant private event space that can host up to 125.
Inspired by the history of our parcel, Garden & Grain is an immersive garden sanctum among the city hustle and bustle.
About Perennial
Located inside The Garden at Palafox & Main just down the road from Perfect Plain Brewery, this funky, upbeat bar is stocked with fresh ingredients and friendly vibes
About The Well
This 3600 square foot building nestled next door to Perfect Plain Brewing Co.â€™s taproom is our place to share the creations of our passions with you. A place to delve into time-honored traditions, push boundaries in fermentation, explore new frontiers with spirits, and push forward the boundaries of flavor. â£
